Suffrage.definition: a vote in deciding a controverted question or the choice of a person for an office or trust [no State…shall be deprived of its equal in the Senate " U.S. Constitution art. V"] 2
Suffrage.origin: [Latin suffragium vote, political support, from suffragari to support with one's vote]

1.definition: a vote in deciding a controverted question or the choice of a person for an office or trust [no State…shall be deprived of its equal in the Senate "art. V"]

2.definition: the right of votingthe exercise of such right
